text: @bbcquestiontime @DavidLammy @nadhimzahawi He wants to let more people die, his government had fair warning about Covid19 about impact on care homes, and yet fail on PPE, fail on Care Homes, Fail on ventilators, fail on track and trace, fail to uphold the law, where is the emergency brake, so these charlatans can go....
